SUBSECTION.TEXT: A Perl wrapper around the Highrise API

SUBSECTION.HEAD: INSTALLATION
SUBSECTION.TEXT: To install this module type the following:
SUBSECTION.CODE: perl Makefile.PL make make test make install

SUBSECTION.HEAD: DEPENDENCIES
SUBSECTION.TEXT: This module depends on the LWP::UserAgent, HTTP::Request and XML::Simple modules. These modules are all available from CPAN (http://search.cpan.org/).
